question: While launching the Covid- 19 vaccine portal, the Union Health Minister released the100-year timeline history of which institution?
explanation:
The Union Health Minister Harshvardhan Singh has recently launched an online portal about Covid-19 with all latest information on the disease.
It will also include date on research development and clinical trials on potential Covid-19 vaccine in the country. The Minister also launched the 100-year timeline history of the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR).
